publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3099 Ross Finnie: Congratulations to East Dunbartonshire for Being the Second-best Performing Local Authority for Exam Performanceâ€”That the Parliament congratulates East Dunbartonshire Council on being the second-top performing local authority in exam results, with 22% of its pupils passing five or more highers and 39% of its pupils passing three or more highers; further notes that Douglas Academy was the third-best performing state-funded school, with 35% if its pupils passing five highers or more, and also notes that a total of six schools from East Dunbartonshire are included in the list of top-performing schools.
S3M-3099 Congratulations to East Dunbartonshire for Being the Second-best Performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-3099 Congratulations to East Dunbartonshire for Being the Second-best Performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) David Whitton*
S3M-3099 Congratulations to East Dunbartonshire for Being the Second-best Performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, David Whitton*
S3M-3099 Congratulations to East Dunbartonshire for Being the Second-best Performing Local Authority for Exam Performance (lodged on 12 December 2008) Stuart McMillan*
